row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &VALUTA_BIS# = '99991231' :SET &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'BBSEreignisRente_Loga_Selekt' :SET &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# = '487' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '800' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# MANDANT = &MANDANTEN# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# OHNEVTRNR = &OHNE_VTR_NR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# BIS = &VALUTA_BIS# BESCHREIBUNG = &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# PROGRAMMTYPAUSL = &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# PROGRAMMTYP = &PROGRAMMTYP# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo 'Test &PROGRAM# &TS#' > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
